entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Val Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val Marie 02:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -31.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -35.1°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
